allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
feat: Add portfolio website with Matrix theme

- Add Hero section with ASCII art and typing animation
- Add About section with terminal-style intro and career history
- Add Projects section with 6 projects \(Journeye, PMS, QuestSchool, etc.\)
- Add Contact section with email link
- Add Matrix rain background animation
- Add project modal with image gallery
- Add responsive navigation
- Configure Next.js for unoptimized images

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
